template <typename BlockT>
struct vsip::impl::Is_pas_block
File: ../../../vsip/core/block_traits.hpp

Traits class to determine if a block has a valid PAS distribution handle (which allows collective assignment to be used). Blocks without a valid PAS distribution must use the low-level direct assignment.

Specializations:
Is_pas_block<Dense<Dim,T,OrderT,Local_map>>
Is_pas_block<Dense<Dim,T,OrderT,MapT>>
